SMW Subobject for InactiveHigh Alchemy value: 60000Buy limit: 500Examine: A blood-filled essence with magical properties.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Blood essenceImage: File:Blood essence.pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.000Value: 100000Version anchor: InactiveRelease date: 5 January 2022Item ID: 26390

Blood essence is an item dropped by certain NPCs in the Ancient Prison as well as a potential reward when opening an intricate pouch. When one is activated, it becomes untradeable and will give a 50% chance to craft an extra blood rune per pure essence or dark essence fragment for no additional experience. Each blood essence can craft an extra 1,000 blood runes before being destroyed. The active blood essence needs to be in your inventory.

As a blood rune costs 361 coins each, each essence would add an additional 361,000 coins in total.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Blood Reaver161; 174 11/128
Intricate pouchN/A 11/200

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 January 2022
(update)
  • The value of the item was halved from 200,000 to 100,000, lowering its high alch value from the previous 120,000.
  • The active version of the item can no longer be alchemised.
5 January 2022
(update | poll)

The item is now obtainable.

16 December 2021
(update)

The item was added to the game, but was unobtainable.

'''Blood essence''' is an item dropped by certain NPCs in the [[Ancient Prison]] as well as a potential reward when opening an [[intricate pouch]]. When one is activated, it becomes untradeable and will give a 50% chance to craft an extra [[blood rune]] per [[pure essence]] or [[dark essence fragment]] for no additional experience. Each blood essence can craft an extra 1,000 blood runes before being destroyed. The active blood essence needs to be in your inventory.

As a blood rune costs {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Blood rune}}}} coins each, each essence would add an additional {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Blood rune|1000}}}} coins in total.
